brand.name: Acme
brand.personality: Acme feels like a precision instrument: calm, confident, and powerful. Built for professionals who value clarity and results over decoration.
brand.visual_metaphor: Data flowing through a clean, structured system — complexity made simple, chaos transformed into clarity.

effects.no_glows: Light theme uses shadows instead of glows for a clean aesthetic

geometry.shapes: Rounded rectangles dominate. Circles reserved for status dots, avatars, and node indicators. No sharp corners — everything feels considered and engineered.

grid.spacing: All padding and margins are multiples of 8px
grid.icon_grid: Icons designed on 48x48 or 64x64, snapping to 8px grid

aspect_ratios.landscape: 16:9 — hero images, feature panels, flow diagrams

weights.hairline: 1px — grid lines, subtle dividers, background rails
weights.emphasis: 2px — key paths, card borders, highlighted routes

style.curves: Smooth bezier curves with gentle tension — never rigid 90° angles

connections.flow_direction: Left-to-right or bottom-left to top-right (implies progress)
connections.arrows: Rounded arrowheads or gradient-fade lines (solid at source, 20% at destination)

dark_mode.primary: Use glows to create depth and focus

layering.hierarchy: One clear focal point per composition

typography.family: Geometric sans-serif (Inter, SF Pro, Geist style)

headings.style: Large size contrast between H1 and body

numbers.usage: Metrics, percentages, data values — often larger than surrounding text

typography.in_images: Minimal text. Short labels and numbers only, never sentences. Hierarchy through weight and size, not font variation.

iconography.style: Outlined icons with rounded caps and joins
iconography.fills: Mostly outline-only. Occasional low-opacity accent fills for emphasis (20-30% opacity).
iconography.construction: Built from basic geometry — circles, rounded rectangles, simple paths. No organic or hand-drawn shapes.

composition.focal_point: Every image has ONE clear focal point, positioned slightly left-of-center or at golden ratio intersection.
composition.balance: Asymmetric: primary element ~60% visual weight, supporting elements ~40%.
composition.negative_space: Generous breathing room. At least 15% padding from edges. Compositions should feel sparse and deliberate, not crowded.
composition.floating_elements: Supporting elements (stat chips, badges, icons) float around the main focal point but never overlap key areas.

perspective.ui_mockups: Slight isometric tilt (10-15 degrees) for depth

consistency_rules: ALL images use the same gradient background direction per theme
ALL cards share the same corner radius family (8/12/16/24px)
ALL connection lines use smooth bezier curves, never hard 90° angles
ALL glows use consistent blur radius (20-28px) and opacity (35-45%)
ALL shadows fall in the same direction (down-right for dark, down for light)
ALL elements sit on an 8px spacing grid
Maximum 2 accent colors per image, plus neutrals
ALL strokes use rounded caps and joins
Dark theme: deep blue-black backgrounds, never pure black (#000000)
Light theme: pure white or off-white backgrounds, never gray-heavy
avoid: Stock photography, realistic photos of people or hands
Brand logos or recognizable company symbols
Playful, bubbly shapes or cartoon-style illustrations
Harsh neon colors or fully saturated accents
Pure black (#000000) — use deep blue-black instead
Busy node networks that feel like noise instead of clear data flow
More than 3 charts or complex elements in a single frame
Long text or sentences inside images — labels only
Warm color dominance (oranges/reds) except for warnings
Sharp corners — everything should feel soft and engineered
Mixing more than 2 accent hues per composition
Heavy drop shadows with hard edges
Gradients that shift hue (blue-to-green) — only shift lightness
